DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long-term visual outcome of the cataract surgery using a large-scale and comprehensive database of pediatric cataract patients, including congenital and traumatic cataract. We will further investigate into the various genetic and environmental factors that may contribute to the pathogenesis of pediatric cataract.
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of pediatric cataract Must be able to cooperate with the ophthalmic examination Clinical diagnosis of mental illness Mentally disabled
